title: The Besties 74 - GD Ritzy's
description:
Russ is gone. We know, we'd thought we'd be thrilled about it too, but damned if we don't miss the little guy. But hey, he'll be back next week, right? Until we're doing our best to cheer ourselves up with video games. Play the pain away.

4:13 - Best Board Game iPad Adaptation (Pandemic)
14:05 - Best Performance by a Supporting Willem Dafoe (Beyond: Two Souls)
24:08 - Halftime!
30:43 - Best Load Screen (GTA Online)
45:58 - The Winner Is!

Theme song by Ian Dorsch
Get the show:

Download MP3"
Subscribe to the podcast (RSS)
Subscribe on iTunes
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (The Besties)
